packagecontents: COR IBR200 LTE Router for IoT
insertSim:
Insert an Activated SIM

  1. Slide open the SIM cover to reveal the SIM slots.
  1. Insert the card into the SIM1 slot, metal contacts down and notch in. It will click into place. Depress again to remove.
  1. Insert the secondary SIM card into the SIM2 slot if desired.



 

  1. Slide the SIM cover over the SIM(s).
  1. Secure with the included screw.
attachAnttena:
Attach the Antennas

  1. Attach the two LTE and one WiFi antennas (included) to the connectors. The antennas are jointed, which enables positioning for optimal signal reception.

    NOTE: Cellular antennas include RP-SMA connectors (pin in the center on the antenna) while WiFi antennas include SMA connectors (pin in the center on the device connection point). Ensure you connect the correct antennas to their applicable connection locations.
  1. Hold the antenna straight and twist the base of the antenna to connect to the device.
  1. Do not over-tighten. The maximum recommended torque is 4 in-lbs.
  1. Angle the antennas for optimal signal reception.
poweron:
Connect the Power Source

  1. Insert four-pin end of the AC adapter to the four-pin port on the router.

  2. Plug the adapter into an electrical socket.
